original: 一切祕密最上名義大教王儀軌
analyzed: 一切祕密最上名義大教王儀軌
translated: The Ritual Manual of the King of the Supreme Meaning of All Secret Mysteries

original: 卷下
analyzed: 卷下
translated: Scroll 2

original: 西天譯經三藏傳法大師
analyzed: 西天譯經三藏傳法大師
translated: Tripiṭaka Master of the Western Regions, Dharma-transmitter,🔽Imperial Envoy, Shi Hu, respectfully translated by imperial decree

original: 賜紫臣施護奉　詔譯布施波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛大嬉戲；
analyzed: 賜紫臣施護奉　詔譯布施波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛大嬉戲；
translated: The Dharma of the perfection of generosity is the great vajra play;

original: 遊戲自在常清淨，　　此即金剛戲菩薩！
analyzed: 遊戲自在常清淨，　　此即金剛戲菩薩！
translated: Playful mastery is always pure, this is the vajra play bodhisattva!

original: 持戒波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛妙寶鬘；
analyzed: 持戒波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛妙寶鬘；
translated: The Dharma of the perfection of morality is the wonderful vajra jewel garland;

original: 莊嚴身意悉清淨，　　此即金剛鬘菩薩！
analyzed: 莊嚴身意悉清淨，　　此即金剛鬘菩薩！
translated: Ornamenting body and mind are all pure, this is the vajra garland bodhisattva!

original: 忍辱波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛妙歌詠；
analyzed: 忍辱波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛妙歌詠；
translated: The Dharma of the perfection of patience is the wonderful vajra singing;

original: 善集正法嗢陀那，　　此即金剛歌菩薩！
analyzed: 善集正法嗢陀那，　　此即金剛歌菩薩！
translated: Well gathering the correct Dharma udāna, this is the vajra singing bodhisattva!

original: 精進波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛妙旋舞；
analyzed: 精進波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛妙旋舞；
translated: The Dharma of the perfection of vigor is the wonderful vajra spinning dance;

original: 非久得成佛菩提，　　此即金剛舞菩薩！
analyzed: 非久得成佛菩提，　　此即金剛舞菩薩！
translated: Before long one will attain buddhahood, this is the vajra dance bodhisattva!

original: 大慧波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛最上香；
analyzed: 大慧波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛最上香；
translated: The Dharma of the perfection of wisdom is the supreme incense of the vajra;

original: 遍一切處廣無邊，　　此即金剛香菩薩！
analyzed: 遍一切處廣無邊，　　此即金剛香菩薩！
translated: Pervading everywhere, vast and boundless, this is Vajra-gandha Bodhisattva!

original: 禪定波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛殊妙華；
analyzed: 禪定波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛殊妙華；
translated: The Dharma of the perfection of meditation is the marvelous flower of the vajra;

original: 蓮華不染泥中生，　　此即金剛華菩薩！
analyzed: 蓮華不染泥中生，　　此即金剛華菩薩！
translated: The lotus is unstained, born from the mud, this is Vajra-puspa Bodhisattva!

original: 勝願波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛廣大燈；
analyzed: 勝願波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛廣大燈；
translated: The Dharma of the perfection of superior vows is the vast lamp of the vajra;

original: 遍一切處悉照明，　　此即金剛燈菩薩！
analyzed: 遍一切處悉照明，　　此即金剛燈菩薩！
translated: Illuminating everywhere, this is Vajra-dīpa Bodhisattva!

original: 方便波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛妙塗香；
analyzed: 方便波羅蜜多法，　　即是金剛妙塗香；
translated: The Dharma of the perfection of skillful means is the marvelous ointment of the vajra;

original: 一切惡香悉清淨，　　此即金剛塗香尊！
analyzed: 一切惡香悉清淨，　　此即金剛塗香尊！
translated: All evil scents are purified, this is Vajra-gandha-bhājana!

original: 一切如來大方便，　　分別四種祕密相；
analyzed: 一切如來大方便，　　分別四種祕密相；
translated: The great skillful means of all tathāgatas distinguishes the four kinds of secret characteristics;

original: 一切羯磨大方便，　　此即金剛鉤菩薩！
analyzed: 一切羯磨大方便，　　此即金剛鉤菩薩！
translated: The great skillful means of all karma is Vajra-aṅkuśa Bodhisattva!

original: 相應行者菩提行，　　是即最上金剛杵；
analyzed: 相應行者菩提行，　　是即最上金剛杵；
translated: The practice of enlightenment is the supreme vajra scepter;

original: 而彼堅固勝妙性，　　此即金剛鎖菩薩！
analyzed: 而彼堅固勝妙性，　　此即金剛鎖菩薩！
translated: That firm and excellent nature is the Bodhisattva Vajra-Chain!

original: 一切法本無所生，　　本來清淨虛空等；
analyzed: 一切法本無所生，　　本來清淨虛空等；
translated: All phenomena are originally unborn, originally pure, and equal to space;

original: 而此法語真實體，　　此即金剛鈴菩薩！
analyzed: 而此法語真實體，　　此即金剛鈴菩薩！
translated: This essence of true speech is the Bodhisattva Vajra-Bell!

original: 觀悉無上菩提心，　　最上佛性所從來；
analyzed: 觀悉無上菩提心，　　最上佛性所從來；
translated: Contemplating the unsurpassed mind of enlightenment, coming from the supreme buddha-nature;

original: 建立波羅蜜多名，　　此即薩埵金剛尊！
analyzed: 建立波羅蜜多名，　　此即薩埵金剛尊！
translated: Establishing the name of the pāramitā is the Lord Vajra-Sattva!

original: 大慧波羅蜜多淨，　　四攝法門從是生；
analyzed: 大慧波羅蜜多淨，　　四攝法門從是生；
translated: The purity of great wisdom pāramitā gives rise to the four means of conversion;

original: 而四攝法利無邊，　　此即寶金剛菩薩！
analyzed: 而四攝法利無邊，　　此即寶金剛菩薩！
translated: The benefits of the four means of conversion are boundless, this is the Bodhisattva Ratna-Vajra!

original: 真實波羅蜜多淨，　　即大波羅蜜多生；
analyzed: 真實波羅蜜多淨，　　即大波羅蜜多生；
translated: The purity of true pāramitā gives rise to the great pāramitā;

original: 祕密法門平等智，　　此即法金剛菩薩！
analyzed: 祕密法門平等智，　　此即法金剛菩薩！
translated: The wisdom of equality in the secret Dharma gate is the Bodhisattva Dharma-Vajra!

original: 金剛波羅蜜多淨，　　即四波羅蜜多王；
analyzed: 金剛波羅蜜多淨，　　即四波羅蜜多王；
translated: The purity of the vajra pāramitā is the king of the four pāramitās;

original: 一切施作悉相應，　　此即羯磨金剛尊！
analyzed: 一切施作悉相應，　　此即羯磨金剛尊！
translated: All activities are mutually corresponding, this is the honored one of the vajra karma!

original: 大智波羅蜜多淨，　　金剛波羅蜜多性；
analyzed: 大智波羅蜜多淨，　　金剛波羅蜜多性；
translated: The purity of the great wisdom pāramitā is the nature of the vajra pāramitā;

original: 一切祕密普相應，　　由是出生十二相。
analyzed: 一切祕密普相應，　　由是出生十二相。
translated: All secret principles are universally corresponding, thus giving rise to the twelve aspects.

original: 當知金剛手出生，　　一切三昧祕密印；
analyzed: 當知金剛手出生，　　一切三昧祕密印；
translated: One should know that Vajrapāṇi gives rise to all the secret mudrās of samādhi;

original: 二種堅固金剛拳！
analyzed: 二種堅固金剛拳！
translated: The two kinds of firm vajra fists!

original: 此即名為羯磨印。
analyzed: 此即名為羯磨印。
translated: This is called the karma mudrā.

original: 無我平等智出生，　　無相無礙無我見；
analyzed: 無我平等智出生，　　無相無礙無我見；
translated: The wisdom of the equality of no-self gives rise to the view of no-self, without characteristics, unobstructed;

original: 一切染愛悉清淨，　　此即金剛手菩薩！
analyzed: 一切染愛悉清淨，　　此即金剛手菩薩！
translated: All defiled love is completely pure, this is Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva!

original: 此說金剛染因緣，　　即是金剛無上智；
analyzed: 此說金剛染因緣，　　即是金剛無上智；
translated: This is said to be the cause and condition of vajra defilement, which is the unsurpassed wisdom of the vajra;

original: 染法復是淨蓮華，　　華即金剛妙法智。
analyzed: 染法復是淨蓮華，　　華即金剛妙法智。
translated: Defiled dharmas are also the pure lotus flower, the flower is the wonderful dharma wisdom of the vajra.

original: 若了自種出自相，　　即一切佛同此攝；
analyzed: 若了自種出自相，　　即一切佛同此攝；
translated: If one understands one's own seed to arise from its own characteristic, then all buddhas are included in this;

original: 二種變化若相應，　　金剛薩埵真供養。
analyzed: 二種變化若相應，　　金剛薩埵真供養。
translated: If the two kinds of transformations are in accord, it is the true offering of Vajrasattva.

original: 大智了知自種子，　　悲愛二法即和合；
analyzed: 大智了知自種子，　　悲愛二法即和合；
translated: Great wisdom understands one's own seed, and the two dharmas of compassion and love are united;

original: 二處相應住等持，　　以無二法破二性。
analyzed: 二處相應住等持，　　以無二法破二性。
translated: In accord with the two places, abiding in meditative absorption, using the non-dual dharma to destroy the two natures.

original: 平等安住曼拏羅，　　從是出大相應法；
analyzed: 平等安住曼拏羅，　　從是出大相應法；
translated: Equally abiding in the maṇḍala, from this arises the great dharma of accord;

original: 戲笑言說及歌舞，　　皆是佛語方便門。
analyzed: 戲笑言說及歌舞，　　皆是佛語方便門。
translated: Playful speech, singing, and dancing, all are expedient means of the Buddha's teachings.

original: 自他二行相應中，　　現諸眾生利益事；
analyzed: 自他二行相應中，　　現諸眾生利益事；
translated: Within the accord of the two practices of self and other, one manifests the beneficial activities for all beings;

original: 自性光明本清淨，　　此即心月曼拏羅。
analyzed: 自性光明本清淨，　　此即心月曼拏羅。
translated: The nature of light is originally pure, this is the maṇḍala of the mind-moon.

original: 貪本清淨如蓮華，　　諸煩惱怨悉除斷；
analyzed: 貪本清淨如蓮華，　　諸煩惱怨悉除斷；
translated: Desire is originally pure like a lotus flower, all the afflictions and enemies are completely eliminated;

original: 最初語言所表示，　　此即大輪曼拏羅。
analyzed: 最初語言所表示，　　此即大輪曼拏羅。
translated: The initial language that is indicated, this is the maṇḍala of the great wheel.

original: 自性光明本清淨，　　而菩提心無有上；
analyzed: 自性光明本清淨，　　而菩提心無有上；
translated: The nature luminosity is originally pure, and the bodhicitta is unsurpassed;

original: 成諸眾生利益事，　　此即妙月曼拏羅。
analyzed: 成諸眾生利益事，　　此即妙月曼拏羅。
translated: Accomplishing the beneficial activities for sentient beings, this is the maṇḍala of the wondrous moon.

original: 智慧清淨所莊嚴，　　從彼金剛喻定生；
analyzed: 智慧清淨所莊嚴，　　從彼金剛喻定生；
translated: Adorned by the purity of wisdom, born from the vajra-like samādhi;

original: 解脫光明平等光，　　此即日輪曼拏羅。
analyzed: 解脫光明平等光，　　此即日輪曼拏羅。
translated: The light of liberation, the light of equality, this is the maṇḍala of the sun.

original: 五佛平等若相應，　　五智和合諸作用；
analyzed: 五佛平等若相應，　　五智和合諸作用；
translated: If the five buddhas are equally in accord, the five wisdoms are the activities of all;

original: 五眼清淨善觀視，　　此即五佛曼拏羅。
analyzed: 五眼清淨善觀視，　　此即五佛曼拏羅。
translated: The five eyes are pure and well observe, this is the maṇḍala of the five buddhas.

original: 金剛杵能破一切，　　執鉤表示相應行；
analyzed: 金剛杵能破一切，　　執鉤表示相應行；
translated: The vajra scepter can destroy everything, the hook held indicates the corresponding practice;

original: 而彼金剛勝妙箭，　　善哉善作歡喜事。
analyzed: 而彼金剛勝妙箭，　　善哉善作歡喜事。
translated: And that excellent vajra arrow, the good and well-done joyful matter.

original: 寶等莊嚴悉具足；
analyzed: 寶等莊嚴悉具足；
translated: The adornments of jewels and so forth are all complete;

original: 日光發生大明照；
analyzed: 日光發生大明照；
translated: The sunlight gives rise to the great illumination;

original: 建立金剛勝妙幢；
analyzed: 建立金剛勝妙幢；
translated: Establishing the excellent vajra banner;

original: 此即開發金剛笑！
analyzed: 此即開發金剛笑！
translated: This is the revealing of the vajra smile!

original: 巧業金剛一切性，　　法爾不破相應行；
analyzed: 巧業金剛一切性，　　法爾不破相應行；
translated: Skillful karma, vajra, all natures, the nature of phenomena, not breaking, corresponding practices;

original: 現利牙相得相應，　　一切印契皆成就。
analyzed: 現利牙相得相應，　　一切印契皆成就。
translated: Manifesting the appearance of fangs, attaining correspondence, all mudras and seals are accomplished.

original: 四種明妃普相應，　　嬉戲行住而無礙；
analyzed: 四種明妃普相應，　　嬉戲行住而無礙；
translated: Universally corresponding with the four kinds of vidya mantras, playfully going and staying without obstruction;

original: 那哩所紡新妙線，　　依其分量善秤界。
analyzed: 那哩所紡新妙線，　　依其分量善秤界。
translated: The new and wonderful thread spun by Naris, according to their measurements, is well weighed and marked off.

original: 當住身語心觀想，　　而以智線作界道；
analyzed: 當住身語心觀想，　　而以智線作界道；
translated: One should abide in the contemplation of body, speech, and mind, and use the thread of wisdom to create the boundary path;

original: 依法安布曼拏羅，　　四方四門四樓閣。
analyzed: 依法安布曼拏羅，　　四方四門四樓閣。
translated: In accordance with the Dharma, arrange the mandala, with four sides, four gates, and four towers.

original: 四線等量分壇隅，　　禰踰賀及尾提相；
analyzed: 四線等量分壇隅，　　禰踰賀及尾提相；
translated: The four threads are equal in size, dividing the corners of the altar, with the characteristics of Ne and Yuha, and Vati;

original: 半全瓔珞并寶拂，　　七寶華鬘等嚴飾。
analyzed: 半全瓔珞并寶拂，　　七寶華鬘等嚴飾。
translated: Half and full necklaces, jeweled whisks, and the adornments of the seven precious flowers and garlands.

original: 壇中安布妙蓮華，　　心曼拏羅為最上；
analyzed: 壇中安布妙蓮華，　　心曼拏羅為最上；
translated: In the center of the altar, arrange the wonderful lotus flower, with the mind mandala being the supreme;

original: 樓閣即是真實智，　　智峯高顯而起立。
analyzed: 樓閣即是真實智，　　智峯高顯而起立。
translated: The tower is precisely the true wisdom, with the peak of wisdom towering and standing.

original: 觀彼壇相外四方，　　一切有情周遍出；
analyzed: 觀彼壇相外四方，　　一切有情周遍出；
translated: Observing the outer square of the mandala, all sentient beings emerge everywhere;🔽The four kinds of minds of loving-kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity,

original: 慈悲喜捨四種心，　　此即表示四種線。
analyzed: 慈悲喜捨四種心，　　此即表示四種線。
translated: These are the representations of the four lines.

original: 所說四線若平等，　　於法正念即相應；
analyzed: 所說四線若平等，　　於法正念即相應；
translated: If the four lines spoken are equal, one is in accord with the correct mindfulness of the Dharma;

original: 若一切見不解脫，　　由智線故而得脫。
analyzed: 若一切見不解脫，　　由智線故而得脫。
translated: If all views are not liberated, one is liberated by the line of wisdom.

original: 壇中蓮華所莊嚴，　　即表最上淨戒行；
analyzed: 壇中蓮華所莊嚴，　　即表最上淨戒行；
translated: The lotus adornments in the mandala represent the supreme practice of pure precepts;

original: 四方中心五牆界，　　即表信等五勝根；
analyzed: 四方中心五牆界，　　即表信等五勝根；
translated: The five walls in the four directions and center represent the five excellent faculties such as faith;

original: 曼拏羅門周遍說，　　即表八解脫法門；
analyzed: 曼拏羅門周遍說，　　即表八解脫法門；
translated: The explanation of the mandala gate everywhere represents the eight gates of liberation;

original: 四門所有四樓閣，　　是即表於四正斷；
analyzed: 四門所有四樓閣，　　是即表於四正斷；
translated: The four towers at the four gates represent the four right efforts;

original: 其壇所有四尾提，　　是即表於四念處；
analyzed: 其壇所有四尾提，　　是即表於四念處；
translated: The four vedikās in the mandala represent the four establishments of mindfulness;

original: 而彼四種禰踰賀，　　是即表於四神足；
analyzed: 而彼四種禰踰賀，　　是即表於四神足；
translated: The four nyagrodhas represent the four bases of supernatural power;

original: 七寶華鬘妙莊嚴，　　是即表於七覺支；
analyzed: 七寶華鬘妙莊嚴，　　是即表於七覺支；
translated: The seven precious flower garlands beautifully adorn, which is an indication of the seven factors of enlightenment;

original: 四門八柱所應知，　　是即表於八聖道。
analyzed: 四門八柱所應知，　　是即表於八聖道。
translated: The four gates and eight pillars should be known, which is an indication of the eightfold noble path.

original: 由彼三摩地智故，　　能令二障得解脫；
analyzed: 由彼三摩地智故，　　能令二障得解脫；
translated: By means of the wisdom of samādhi, one is able to liberate from the two hindrances;

original: 壇中所有妙寶拂，　　是即表於勝道智。
analyzed: 壇中所有妙寶拂，　　是即表於勝道智。
translated: The wonderful jeweled fly-whisk in the altar is an indication of the wisdom of the supreme path.

original: 壇中全分瓔珞者，　　即表全斷諸煩惱；
analyzed: 壇中全分瓔珞者，　　即表全斷諸煩惱；
translated: The complete necklace in the altar indicates the complete severing of all afflictions;

original: 瓔珞體即是勝智，　　故諸煩惱能除斷。
analyzed: 瓔珞體即是勝智，　　故諸煩惱能除斷。
translated: The essence of the necklace is the supreme wisdom, therefore it is able to completely sever all afflictions.

original: 所有半分瓔珞者，　　即表半斷諸煩惱；
analyzed: 所有半分瓔珞者，　　即表半斷諸煩惱；
translated: The half necklace indicates the severing of half of the afflictions;

original: 自他二行相應故，　　蓋纏煩惱半分斷。
analyzed: 自他二行相應故，　　蓋纏煩惱半分斷。
translated: Because it accords with the two practices of self and other, the afflictions of the five hindrances are half severed.

original: 無我平等如虛空，　　無貪妙智復最上；
analyzed: 無我平等如虛空，　　無貪妙智復最上；
translated: Selflessness is equal to the sky, and the wonderful wisdom of non-greed is supreme;

original: 貪心淨故亦無二，　　此即名為智莊嚴。
analyzed: 貪心淨故亦無二，　　此即名為智莊嚴。
translated: Because the greedy mind is pure, there is also no duality, which is called the adornment of wisdom.

original: 若以無貪得菩提，　　菩提即與貪心異；
analyzed: 若以無貪得菩提，　　菩提即與貪心異；
translated: If one attains enlightenment through non-greed, enlightenment is different from the greedy mind;

original: 菩提心體既無差，　　是故貪無貪不二。
analyzed: 菩提心體既無差，　　是故貪無貪不二。
translated: Since the essence of the enlightened mind is undifferentiated, therefore greed and non-greed are not two.

original: 世間貪無貪二種，　　應以方便善觀想；
analyzed: 世間貪無貪二種，　　應以方便善觀想；
translated: The two kinds of worldly greed and non-greed should be skillfully contemplated;

original: 印成就法從貪生，　　及餘一切皆成就。
analyzed: 印成就法從貪生，　　及餘一切皆成就。
translated: The method of accomplishing the seal arises from greed, and all other [methods] are accomplished.

original: 若住世間調伏心，　　乃起相應平等行；
analyzed: 若住世間調伏心，　　乃起相應平等行；
translated: If one abides in the subdued mind of the world, then one gives rise to the practice of equality and accord;

original: 不調伏心既清淨，　　此即貪亦是供養。
analyzed: 不調伏心既清淨，　　此即貪亦是供養。
translated: The subdued mind, being pure, is precisely greed and also an offering.

original: 所有廣說諸行相，　　是即分別境界相；
analyzed: 所有廣說諸行相，　　是即分別境界相；
translated: All the extensively explained characteristics of practice are precisely the characteristics of the discriminated realm;

original: 若住身語心印門，　　所印即是真實智。
analyzed: 若住身語心印門，　　所印即是真實智。
translated: If one abides in the door of the seal of body, speech, and mind, the sealed [mind] is precisely true wisdom.

original: 觀想此印若相應，　　於諸印中常自在；
analyzed: 觀想此印若相應，　　於諸印中常自在；
translated: Contemplating this seal, if it accords, one is always in control among all seals;

original: 而此印法若了知，　　觀想諸印皆成就。
analyzed: 而此印法若了知，　　觀想諸印皆成就。
translated: If one understands this seal method, contemplating all seals is accomplished.

original: 於諸境界相和合，　　知已相應平等行；
analyzed: 於諸境界相和合，　　知已相應平等行；
translated: Knowing and then practicing equally in accordance with their characteristics;

original: 如其諸相若相應，　　一切悉地皆圓滿。
analyzed: 如其諸相若相應，　　一切悉地皆圓滿。
translated: As their characteristics are in accordance, all accomplishments are perfected.

original: 一切祕密中幖幟，　　右即表示於慧門；
analyzed: 一切祕密中幖幟，　　右即表示於慧門；
translated: The symbols in all secrets, the right indicates the door of wisdom;

original: 左為悲門義亦然，　　如其所表常觀想。
analyzed: 左為悲門義亦然，　　如其所表常觀想。
translated: The left is also the meaning of the door of compassion, as they are indicated.

original: 二手相合結印時，　　即表二種三摩地；
analyzed: 二手相合結印時，　　即表二種三摩地；
translated: When the two hands are joined to form a mudra, it indicates the two kinds of samadhi;

original: 二足所有幖幟相，　　即表自他二利行。
analyzed: 二足所有幖幟相，　　即表自他二利行。
translated: The symbols of the two feet indicate the two kinds of benefiting oneself and others.

original: 五指平等若相應，　　表莊嚴五曼拏羅；
analyzed: 五指平等若相應，　　表莊嚴五曼拏羅；
translated: If the five fingers are equally in accordance, it indicates adorning the five mandalas;

original: 五佛現成正等覺，　　其所表示如次第。
analyzed: 五佛現成正等覺，　　其所表示如次第。
translated: The five Buddhas manifest perfect supreme enlightenment, their indications are in the sequence.

original: 中指即表虛空生；
analyzed: 中指即表虛空生；
translated: The middle finger indicates Akasagarbha;

original: 頭指表示地天壇；
analyzed: 頭指表示地天壇；
translated: The index finger indicates the earth deity altar;

original: 無名指及大小指；
analyzed: 無名指及大小指；
translated: The ring finger and little finger;

original: 水大風天壇如次。
analyzed: 水大風天壇如次。
translated: The water and wind deity altars are in sequence.

original: 於臍輪處觀想時，　　表示金剛界佛母！
analyzed: 於臍輪處觀想時，　　表示金剛界佛母！
translated: When visualizing at the navel cakra, it indicates the Vajradhātu Buddha Mother!

original: 若復於心作觀想，　　即表薩埵金剛尊！
analyzed: 若復於心作觀想，　　即表薩埵金剛尊！
translated: If one further visualizes in the heart, it indicates the Vajrasattva Lord!

original: 眉間表示寶金剛！🔽　　頸上表示法金剛！
analyzed: 眉間表示寶金剛！ 　　頸上表示法金剛！
translated: The brow indicates the Ratnavajrā!🔽The neck indicates the Dharmeśvara!

original: 頂表羯摩金剛尊！
analyzed: 頂表羯摩金剛尊！
translated: The crown indicates the Karmavajra Lord!

original: 如其所表善觀想。
analyzed: 如其所表善觀想。
translated: One should visualize well as indicated.

original: 五佛現成正等覺，　　五智圓滿皆成就；
analyzed: 五佛現成正等覺，　　五智圓滿皆成就；
translated: The five Buddhas manifest perfect supreme enlightenment, the five wisdoms are fully accomplished;

original: 五種色相若相應，　　五曼拏羅而出現。
analyzed: 五種色相若相應，　　五曼拏羅而出現。
translated: The five forms are in accord, and the five maṇḍalas appear.

original: 若於前聲有所聞，　　是即表於前名句；
analyzed: 若於前聲有所聞，　　是即表於前名句；
translated: If one hears a sound in front, it indicates the name and phrase in front;

original: 如其後聲有所聞，　　此即表示於後義。
analyzed: 如其後聲有所聞，　　此即表示於後義。
translated: If one hears a sound in the back, it indicates the meaning in the back.

original: 又於前聲有所聞，　　此即表示於因義；
analyzed: 又於前聲有所聞，　　此即表示於因義；
translated: Moreover, if one hears a sound in front, it indicates the meaning of the cause;

original: 如其後聲有所聞，　　此即表示於果義。
analyzed: 如其後聲有所聞，　　此即表示於果義。
translated: If one hears a sound in the back, it indicates the meaning of the effect.

original: 諸佛世尊無二法，　　是中因果不可得；
analyzed: 諸佛世尊無二法，　　是中因果不可得；
translated: The buddhas, the world-honored ones, have no dualistic dharmas,

original: 根本無性法門中，　　是故諸法皆常住。
analyzed: 根本無性法門中，　　是故諸法皆常住。
translated: In the gateway of the fundamental naturelessness, therefore all dharmas are eternally abiding.

original: 自心覺了即是佛，　　能覺所覺心亦忘；
analyzed: 自心覺了即是佛，　　能覺所覺心亦忘；
translated: One's own mind's realization is precisely the Buddha, the realizing mind and the realized mind are also forgotten;

original: 諸佛如來境界中，　　而菩提心無有異。
analyzed: 諸佛如來境界中，　　而菩提心無有異。
translated: In the realm of the buddhas, the tathāgatas, the bodhi mind is without difference.

original: 一切眾生光明性，　　於一切處相平等；
analyzed: 一切眾生光明性，　　於一切處相平等；
translated: The luminous nature of all sentient beings, in all places the characteristics are equal;

original: 而眾生性本清淨，　　菩提由斯而建立。
analyzed: 而眾生性本清淨，　　菩提由斯而建立。
translated: And the nature of sentient beings is originally pure, bodhi is established by this.

original: 於心無動善關鎖，　　而堅固性自成就；
analyzed: 於心無動善關鎖，　　而堅固性自成就；
translated: In the mind, the well-fastened lock of non-movement, and the nature of solidity is self-accomplished;

original: 髻中想住等引心，　　被甲護身常勇健。
analyzed: 髻中想住等引心，　　被甲護身常勇健。
translated: In the topknot, imagine abiding in the mind of meditative concentration, wearing armor to protect the body, always courageous and strong.

original: 所有諸佛正了知，　　金剛語即是如來！
analyzed: 所有諸佛正了知，　　金剛語即是如來！
translated: All the buddhas' correct understanding, the vajra speech is precisely the Tathāgata!

original: 二處三摩鉢底門，　　毘盧遮那佛無異。
analyzed: 二處三摩鉢底門，　　毘盧遮那佛無異。
translated: The door of samādhi in the two places, the Buddha Mahāvairocana is without difference.

original: 法中十二歲那哩，　　所說即是佛如來！
analyzed: 法中十二歲那哩，　　所說即是佛如來！
translated: In the Dharma, the twelve-year Nari is precisely the Buddha Tathagata!

original: 十六歲者即表示，　　金剛手等十六尊！
analyzed: 十六歲者即表示，　　金剛手等十六尊！
translated: The sixteen-year-old one indicates the sixteen honored ones such as Vajrapani!

original: 二十歲者諸禰尾，　　即是祕密二十天！
analyzed: 二十歲者諸禰尾，　　即是祕密二十天！
translated: The twenty-year-old ones are the various Nemi, which are precisely the twenty secret deities!

original: 作二十種供養事，　　彼二十眾應如次。
analyzed: 作二十種供養事，　　彼二十眾應如次。
translated: Performing the twenty kinds of offering rituals, those twenty groups should be in sequence.

original: 自那囉者本部生，　　即是所說自大明；
analyzed: 自那囉者本部生，　　即是所說自大明；
translated: The self-Nara is born from one's own section, which is precisely the self-great mantra that is explained;

original: 他那囉者別部生，　　即是所說他大明。
analyzed: 他那囉者別部生，　　即是所說他大明。
translated: The other Nara is born from a different section, which is precisely the other-great mantra that is explained.

original: 真實了知諸所作，　　心曼拏羅為最上；
analyzed: 真實了知諸所作，　　心曼拏羅為最上；
translated: Truly understanding all activities, the mind mandala is supreme;

original: 作諸供養要專精，　　當以身語心供養。
analyzed: 作諸供養要專精，　　當以身語心供養。
translated: Performing all offerings must be done with utmost sincerity, and one should make offerings with body, speech, and mind.

original: 自金剛杵蓮華合，　　二處平等而出生；
analyzed: 自金剛杵蓮華合，　　二處平等而出生；
translated: One's own vajra and lotus united, born from the equality of the two places;

original: 觀自種相即佛相，　　金剛薩埵真供養。
analyzed: 觀自種相即佛相，　　金剛薩埵真供養。
translated: Contemplating one's own seed characteristics are precisely the Buddha's characteristics, the true offering of Vajrasattva.

original: 半全瓔珞寶拂等，　　諸莊嚴相如前說；
analyzed: 半全瓔珞寶拂等，　　諸莊嚴相如前說；
translated: The characteristics of the adornments are as explained before;🔽In this case, the size of the maṇḍala

original: 此中曼拏羅分量，　　應十二或十六肘。
analyzed: 此中曼拏羅分量，　　應十二或十六肘。
translated: Should be twelve or sixteen cubits.🔽Next, gradually increasing to twenty cubits,

original: 次復漸增二十肘，　　曼拏羅相當周遍；
analyzed: 次復漸增二十肘，　　曼拏羅相當周遍；
translated: The maṇḍala should be completely surrounded;🔽When combined with twenty-five cubits,

original: 合用二十五肘時，　　即作二十五肘量。
analyzed: 合用二十五肘時，　　即作二十五肘量。
translated: Make it the size of twenty-five cubits.🔽In the middle of the maṇḍala, divide

original: 於曼拏羅門中分，　　九分分布如儀軌；
analyzed: 於曼拏羅門中分，　　九分分布如儀軌；
translated: Into nine parts and distribute according to the ritual;🔽Distribute the neyaha as appropriate,

original: 隨應分布禰踰賀，　　曼拏羅門善思察。
analyzed: 隨應分布禰踰賀，　　曼拏羅門善思察。
translated: And carefully observe the maṇḍala gate.🔽Make the inner maṇḍala equal,

original: 內曼拏羅平等作，　　曼拏羅半禰踰賀；
analyzed: 內曼拏羅平等作，　　曼拏羅半禰踰賀；
translated: And the maṇḍala half neyaha;🔽In this way, not apart from the nine parts,

original: 如是不離九分中，　　曼拏羅隅善安布。
analyzed: 如是不離九分中，　　曼拏羅隅善安布。
translated: Skillfully arrange the maṇḍala corners.🔽What is to be used in the four directions of the altar,

original: 壇中四方所應用，　　四尾提相當安布；
analyzed: 壇中四方所應用，　　四尾提相當安布；
translated: The four vetihas should be arranged;🔽If the five colors are harmoniously combined,

original: 五色和合若相應，　　五曼拏羅為嚴飾。
analyzed: 五色和合若相應，　　五曼拏羅為嚴飾。
translated: The five maṇḍalas are used as adornments.

original: 五眼觀視淨諸惡，　　五色即是五如來！
analyzed: 五眼觀視淨諸惡，　　五色即是五如來！
translated: The five eyes observe and purify all evils, the five colors are the five Tathagatas!

original: 五佛平等法相應，　　地分五色莊嚴相。
analyzed: 五佛平等法相應，　　地分五色莊嚴相。
translated: The five Buddhas are equal and correspond to the Dharma, the earth is divided into five colors and adorned.

original: 當於五曼拏羅中，　　想安五佛依方位；
analyzed: 當於五曼拏羅中，　　想安五佛依方位；
translated: In the five mandalas, imagine the five Buddhas according to the directions;

original: 五種功德悉周圓，　　五色即五三摩地。
analyzed: 五種功德悉周圓，　　五色即五三摩地。
translated: The five kinds of merits are all complete, the five colors are the five samadhis.

original: 其壇中心地清淨，　　月愛摩尼光妙色；
analyzed: 其壇中心地清淨，　　月愛摩尼光妙色；
translated: The center of the altar is pure, with the wonderful color of the moon-loving maṇi light;

original: 東方地相大青色；🔽　　南方黃色如儀軌；
analyzed: 東方地相大青色； 　　南方黃色如儀軌；
translated: The eastern earth is a great blue color;🔽The southern color is yellow according to the ritual;

original: 西方赤色隨所應；
analyzed: 西方赤色隨所應；
translated: The western color is red as appropriate;

original: 北方曼𡁠瑟吒色。
analyzed: 北方曼𡁠瑟吒色。
translated: The northern color is maṇiṣiṭa.

original: 諸處皆用尾提相，　　唯門中道勿應用。
analyzed: 諸處皆用尾提相，　　唯門中道勿應用。
translated: All places use the vaiḍūrya characteristics, only the middle of the gate should not be used.

original: 壇中毘盧遮那佛！
analyzed: 壇中毘盧遮那佛！
translated: In the altar, Vairocana Buddha!

original: 想現水精月光相；
analyzed: 想現水精月光相；
translated: Imagine the appearance of crystal moonlight;

original: 彼一切佛同一攝，　　此即無畏眼如來！
analyzed: 彼一切佛同一攝，　　此即無畏眼如來！
translated: All Buddhas are of the same essence, this is the fearless eye Tathāgata!

original: 東方觀想阿閦佛！
analyzed: 東方觀想阿閦佛！
translated: In the east, visualize Akṣobhya Buddha!

original: 出現帝青光明相；
analyzed: 出現帝青光明相；
translated: Appearing with the appearance of imperial blue light;

original: 一切金剛同一攝，　　此即金剛眼如來！
analyzed: 一切金剛同一攝，　　此即金剛眼如來！
translated: All vajras are the same in essence, this is the Tathāgata Vajranetra!

original: 南方觀想寶生佛！
analyzed: 南方觀想寶生佛！
translated: Visualize the Buddha Ratnasaṃbhava in the south!

original: 出現閻浮金光相；
analyzed: 出現閻浮金光相；
translated: Appearing with the appearance of the light of Jambūnada gold;

original: 諸佛普攝利眾生，　　此即光明眼如來！
analyzed: 諸佛普攝利眾生，　　此即光明眼如來！
translated: The buddhas universally gather to benefit sentient beings, this is the Tathāgata Jyotivajra!

original: 西方觀想無量壽！
analyzed: 西方觀想無量壽！
translated: Visualize Amitāyus in the west!

original: 出現蓮華色大光；
analyzed: 出現蓮華色大光；
translated: Appearing with the great light of the color of a lotus flower;

original: 從法智生大無畏，　　此即蓮華眼如來！
analyzed: 從法智生大無畏，　　此即蓮華眼如來！
translated: Born from the wisdom of the Dharma, greatly fearless, this is the Tathāgata Padmanetra!

original: 北方不空成就佛！
analyzed: 北方不空成就佛！
translated: The Buddha Amoghasiddhi in the north!

original: 出現摩竭色光相；
analyzed: 出現摩竭色光相；
translated: Appearing with the appearance of the light of the color of maṇḍala;

original: 普攝眾生亦同生，　　此即慈愛眼如來！
analyzed: 普攝眾生亦同生，　　此即慈愛眼如來！
translated: Universally gathering sentient beings and also being born together, this is the Tathāgata Maitrīnetra!

original: 復次曼拏羅中想，　　諸佛勝妙無上智；
analyzed: 復次曼拏羅中想，　　諸佛勝妙無上智；
translated: Furthermore, visualize in the maṇḍala, the supreme and wonderful wisdom of the buddhas;

original: 從虛空界所出生，　　最上妙月曼拏羅。
analyzed: 從虛空界所出生，　　最上妙月曼拏羅。
translated: Born from the realm of space, the supreme and wonderful maṇḍala of the moon.

original: 中想諸佛影像已，　　次想佛眼菩薩尊！
analyzed: 中想諸佛影像已，　　次想佛眼菩薩尊！
translated: Having visualized the reflections of the buddhas in the center, next visualize the venerable Bodhisattva Buddha-netra!

original: 淨目修廣面端嚴，　　月愛摩尼光妙色，
analyzed: 淨目修廣面端嚴，　　月愛摩尼光妙色，
translated: Pure eyes, a well-proportioned face, and an upright appearance, with the wondrous color of a moon-loving maṇi jewel,

original: 身諸相分皆圓滿，　　一切明妃中最上，
analyzed: 身諸相分皆圓滿，　　一切明妃中最上，
translated: The various parts of the body are all perfectly complete, supreme among all the mudrā consorts,

original: 觀想手持於大輪，　　普令三界悉敬愛；
analyzed: 觀想手持於大輪，　　普令三界悉敬愛；
translated: Visualize holding a great wheel in the hand, causing all in the three realms to be respectfully loved;

original: 次想成就事業智，　　是智等於虛空界，
analyzed: 次想成就事業智，　　是智等於虛空界，
translated: Next, visualize the accomplishment of the wisdom of activities, this wisdom is equal to the realm of space,

original: 虛空金剛中出現，　　最上妙月曼拏羅；
analyzed: 虛空金剛中出現，　　最上妙月曼拏羅；
translated: Emerging from the vajra in the sky, the supreme and wondrous maṇḍala of the moon;

original: 中想諸佛影像已，　　次想摩摩枳聖尊！
analyzed: 中想諸佛影像已，　　次想摩摩枳聖尊！
translated: Having visualized the reflections of all buddhas in the middle, next visualize the holy lord Mamangki!

original: 淨目修廣面端嚴，　　青優鉢羅華色相，
analyzed: 淨目修廣面端嚴，　　青優鉢羅華色相，
translated: Pure eyes, a well-proportioned face, and an upright appearance, with the color and form of a blue utpala flower,

original: 身諸相分皆圓滿，　　虛空幻化最上尊，
analyzed: 身諸相分皆圓滿，　　虛空幻化最上尊，
translated: The various parts of the body are all perfectly complete, the supreme lord of illusory transformations in the sky,

original: 手持青優鉢羅華，　　普令三界悉歸命。
analyzed: 手持青優鉢羅華，　　普令三界悉歸命。
translated: Holding a blue utpala flower in the hand, causing all in the three realms to take refuge.

original: 次想菩提清淨智，　　是智等於虛空界，
analyzed: 次想菩提清淨智，　　是智等於虛空界，
translated: Next, visualize the pure wisdom of enlightenment, this wisdom is equal to the realm of space,

original: 虛空金剛中出現，　　最上妙月曼拏羅。
analyzed: 虛空金剛中出現，　　最上妙月曼拏羅。
translated: Appearing within the vajra of space, the supreme and wondrous moon maṇḍala.

original: 中想諸佛影像已，　　次想白衣菩薩尊！
analyzed: 中想諸佛影像已，　　次想白衣菩薩尊！
translated: In the center, imagine the reflected images of all buddhas, and next imagine the venerable Bodhisattva White-robed!

original: 淨目修廣面端嚴，　　蓮華摩尼光妙色，
analyzed: 淨目修廣面端嚴，　　蓮華摩尼光妙色，
translated: Pure eyes, long and broad face, dignified, with the wondrous color of lotus and maṇi light,

original: 身諸相分皆圓滿，　　祕密金剛法智尊，
analyzed: 身諸相分皆圓滿，　　祕密金剛法智尊，
translated: The features of the body all perfect, the secret vajra Dharma wisdom lord,

original: 手持赤優鉢羅華，　　得一切佛常觀照。
analyzed: 手持赤優鉢羅華，　　得一切佛常觀照。
translated: Holding in the hand a red utpala flower, attaining all buddhas, always contemplating and illuminating.

original: 次想金剛禪定智，　　是智等於虛空界，
analyzed: 次想金剛禪定智，　　是智等於虛空界，
translated: Next, imagine the vajra concentration wisdom, this wisdom equal to the realm of space,

original: 從是虛空所出生，　　最上妙月曼拏羅。
analyzed: 從是虛空所出生，　　最上妙月曼拏羅。
translated: Born from this space, the supreme and wondrous moon maṇḍala.

original: 中想諸佛影像已，　　次想多羅菩提尊！
analyzed: 中想諸佛影像已，　　次想多羅菩提尊！
translated: In the center, imagine the reflected images of all buddhas, and next imagine the venerable Tārā Bodhi!

original: 淨目修廣面端嚴，　　最上黃金光妙色，
analyzed: 淨目修廣面端嚴，　　最上黃金光妙色，
translated: Pure eyes, long and broad face, dignified, with the wondrous color of supreme golden light,

original: 身諸相分皆圓滿，　　明妃自在嬉戲尊，
analyzed: 身諸相分皆圓滿，　　明妃自在嬉戲尊，
translated: The features of the body all perfect, the illuminating consort, the sovereign of playful revelry,

original: 手持黃優鉢羅華，　　一切眾生悉歸命。
analyzed: 手持黃優鉢羅華，　　一切眾生悉歸命。
translated: Holding yellow utpala flowers in their hands, all sentient beings take refuge.

original: 如是四菩薩彼彼心大明。
analyzed: 如是四菩薩彼彼心大明。
translated: Thus, each of these four bodhisattvas has their own great mantra.

original: 佛眼菩薩大明曰：🔽唵引　嚕嚕　塞普二合嚕一句　入嚩二合羅二　底瑟吒三二合　悉馱　路引左儞四　薩哩嚩二合引囉他二合娑引達儞　莎引賀引五摩摩枳菩薩大明曰：
analyzed: 佛眼菩薩大明曰： 唵引　嚕嚕　塞普二合嚕一句　入嚩二合羅二　底瑟吒三二合　悉馱　路引左儞四　薩哩嚩二合引囉他二合娑引達儞　莎引賀引五摩摩枳菩薩大明曰：
translated: The great mantra of Bodhisattva Buddha Eye is:

original: 唵引　商葛黎引一句　扇引底葛黎引二　瞿吒瞿吒三瞿吒儞四　伽引多野伽引多野五　瞿致儞　莎引賀引六白衣菩薩大明曰：
analyzed: 唵引　商葛黎引一句　扇引底葛黎引二　瞿吒瞿吒三瞿吒儞四　伽引多野伽引多野五　瞿致儞　莎引賀引六白衣菩薩大明曰：

original: 唵引　葛致引一　尾葛致引二　儞葛致引三　葛啗葛致引四　葛嚕引吒尾哩曳二合引　莎引賀引五多羅菩薩大明曰：🔽唵引　多引黎引一句　覩多引黎引二　覩黎引　莎引賀引三如是四菩薩四種大明，總攝祕密身語心業，諸供養中是真供養，金剛三密普護一切，於一切處常所出生，一切所作無不成就。🔽此相應法自性清淨，諸修相應行者，當如實知、如實所作，即得真實成就。
analyzed: 唵引　葛致引一　尾葛致引二　儞葛致引三　葛啗葛致引四　葛嚕引吒尾哩曳二合引　莎引賀引五多羅菩薩大明曰： 唵引　多引黎引一句　覩多引黎引二　覩黎引　莎引賀引三如是四菩薩四種大明，總攝祕密身語心業，諸供養中是真供養，金剛三密普護一切，於一切處常所出生，一切所作無不成就。 此相應法自性清淨，諸修相應行者，當如實知、如實所作，即得真實成就。

original: 此相應行從祕密智所出生故，是即般若波羅蜜多方便三摩地智，由是一切事業悉能成辦，一切輪迴悉得清淨。
analyzed: 此相應行從祕密智所出生故，是即般若波羅蜜多方便三摩地智，由是一切事業悉能成辦，一切輪迴悉得清淨。
translated: Because these corresponding practices arise from secret wisdom, they are the wisdom of prajñā-pāramitā, skillful means, samādhi, and wisdom, by which all activities can be accomplished and all saṃsāra can be purified.

original: 如最上寶自體光明常所照耀，輪迴清淨亦復如是。
analyzed: 如最上寶自體光明常所照耀，輪迴清淨亦復如是。
translated: Just as the self-nature radiance of the supreme jewel is always illuminating, the purification of saṃsāra is also like this.

original: 又若相應行者，於此相應法門能善修習，即是金剛界中大愛樂者，復能圓滿解脫大智，四祕密法亦得成就，如諸佛所說此名大智者！
analyzed: 又若相應行者，於此相應法門能善修習，即是金剛界中大愛樂者，復能圓滿解脫大智，四祕密法亦得成就，如諸佛所說此名大智者！
translated: Moreover, if a practitioner of corresponding practice can cultivate well this corresponding Dharma door, he will be a great lover in the vajra realm, and will also be able to perfect the great wisdom of liberation, and accomplish the four secret methods, as taught by the Buddhas, this is called the great wisdom-possessor!🔽Here is the corrected and aligned text:

original: 一切祕密最上名義儀軌卷下
analyzed: 一切祕密最上名義儀軌卷下
translated: The Utmost Secret Supreme Meaning and Procedures, Scroll 2
